features.title: Core Capabilities
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed to manage every aspect of the ride-hailing experience.
features.liveMapDesc: Real-time tracking of riders and passengers on the map with sub-second latency.

features.configDesc: Fine-tune fare rules, zones, and service availability at a moment's notice.
features.auditDesc: Track system activities and significant events with complete transparency.
